import React, { Component } from 'react' import { Form, Button, Input, Message, Checkbox } from 'semantic-ui-react' import Layout from '../components/Layout' import FileSaver from 'file-saver' import { network } from '../src/web3.js' import config from '../config.json' const CONFIG_FILE_PATH = './config.json' class Settings extends Component { state = { liquidatorAddress: config[network].liquidatorAddress, addressToLiquidate: config[network].addressToLiquidate, collateralAddress: config[network].collateralAddress, repayTokenAddress: config[network].repayTokenAddress, lpAddressProviderAddress: config[network].lpAddressProviderAddress, lpAddress: config[network].lpAddress, latestLpCoreAddress: config[network].latestLpCoreAddress, wss: config[network].wss, http: config[network].http, mnemonic: config[network].mnemonic, ethGasStationAPIKey: config[network].ethGasStationAPIKey, dynamicGasPrice: config[network].dynamicGasPrice, liquidationAmount: config[network].liquidationAmount, gasPrice: config[network].gasPrice, gasLimit: config[network].gasLimit, receiveATokens: config[network].receiveATokens, errorMessage: '', } onSubmit = async (event) => { event.preventDefault() console.log(this.state) var configFile = { liquidatorAddress: '0x8e5687908487cf9362632D074965Fe4B83D660a2', addressToLiquidate: '0x8e5687908487cf9362632D074965Fe4B83D660a2', collateralAddress: '0x851dEf71f0e6A903375C1e536Bd9ff1684BAD802', repayTokenAddress: '0xf80A32A835F79D7787E8a8ee5721D0fEaFd78108', lpAddressProviderAddress: '0x1c8756FD2B28e9426CDBDcC7E3c4d64fa9A54728', lpAddress: '0x9E5C7835E4b13368fd628196C4f1c6cEc89673Fa', latestLpCoreAddress: '0x4295Ee704716950A4dE7438086d6f0FBC0BA9472', wss: 'wss://ropsten.infura.io/ws/v3/36e70f3c9a564b0ab5e15d2705568704', http: 'https://ropsten.infura.io/v3/36e70f3c9a564b0ab5e15d2705568704', mnemonic: 'mesh comfort sketch patch damp payment online audit ceiling glare toddler space', ethGasStationAPIKey: 'b489d066f665b6ccc6297561436a349d56ca84cee5b38b65ea9dac195556', dynamicGasPrice: true, liquidationAmount: '0', gasPrice: 1000000000, gasLimit: 1000000, receiveATokens: false, } var blob = new Blob([JSON.stringify(configFile)], { type: 'application/json', }) FileSaver.saveAs(blob, 'hello world.json') } render() { return (

This is the Settings Screen

this.setState({ liquidatorAddress: event.target.value }) } /> this.setState({ addressToLiquidate: event.target.value }) } /> this.setState({ collateralAddress: event.target.value }) } /> this.setState({ repayTokenAddress: event.target.value }) } /> this.setState({ lpAddressProviderAddress: event.target.value, }) } /> this.setState({ lpAddress: event.target.value }) } /> this.setState({ latestLpCoreAddress: event.target.value }) } /> this.setState({ wss: event.target.value })} /> this.setState({ http: event.target.value }) } /> this.setState({ mnemonic: event.target.value }) } /> this.setState({ liquidationAmount: event.target.value }) } /> this.setState({ gasLimit: event.target.value }) } /> this.setState({ ethGasStationAPIKey: event.target.value }) } /> this.setState({ gasPrice: event.target.value }) } /> this.setState(({ dynamicGasPrice }) => ({ dynamicGasPrice: !dynamicGasPrice, })) } /> this.setState(({ receiveATokens }) => ({ receiveATokens: !receiveATokens, })) } />
) } } export default Settings
